name: Rush Delivery
description: Move your order to priority queue with 24-hour turnaround where possible.

name: Alternate Master Version
description: Receive an additional master optimized for social media short-form platforms.

name: Instrumental Bounce
description: Includes an instrumental version for performances and sync pitching.

name: Vocal Up Mix
description: Provides a vocal-forward mix ideal for lyric-focused releases.

name: Radio Edit
description: Creates a clean, concise edit suitable for radio and playlist placements.

name: Stems Export
description: Delivers organized stems for live playback, remixes, or label requests.

name: Noise Reduction Intensive
description: Advanced restoration pass for problematic recordings with persistent background noise.

name: Revision Pack (2 Extra)
description: Adds two additional revision rounds beyond the standard included changes.

name: Project File Archive
description: Secure archive and backup of your session files for 12 months.
